meanings.sent1: She singularized her favorite toy by adding her name to it.
meanings.sent2: The artist singularized each painting with a unique signature.
meanings.sent3: The chef singularized the dish by adding a surprising ingredient.
meanings.sent4: His talent singularized him from the rest of the contestants.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors singularized the flower in the garden.

meanings.sent1: He singularized his backpack by attaching a keychain to it.
meanings.sent2: Each student singularized their project by adding personal touches.
meanings.sent3: The comedian singularized his jokes with clever wordplay.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness singularized her as a true friend.
meanings.sent5: The melody singularized the song from the others on the album.

meanings.definition: To distinguish or separate from others.
meanings.sent1: The detective singularized the suspect by noticing a unique tattoo.
meanings.sent2: The new logo singularized the company in a crowded market.
meanings.sent3: The cat singularized itself by wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: His loud laughter singularized him in the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The strong scent singularized the perfume from the rest on the shelf.
